price: O Profet! Allahu të mjafton ty dhe besimtarëve që të pasojnë.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ حَسۡبُكَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nabiyu ḥasbuka al-lahu wamani ittabaʿaka mina al-mu'minīna
